attributes.additional_details:
thousands of people are having to sell their homes or use savings to pay for heath care when they should qualify
for free care under the NHSMake people aware that this is available and cut the red tape of CCGs
to make the criteria clear for all to understand.
attributes.background:
stop CCGs from denying funds and revise the system so people with
mental and physical needs such as dementia have access to free health care as stated in the 2012 heath care act.
